page.title: 07MEDIA
page.content:
"HOW TO PUT YOUR DUSTBIN ON A DIET" THERE WILL NOT BE AS MUCH RUBBISH IN BINS ANY MORE. THERE WILL BE A RE- CYCLING PLACE FOR CERTAIN RUBBISH. OLD SPECTACLES,BOTTLES,PAPER,RAGS OR EVEN SCRAP CARS NEED NO LONGER BE WASTED NOW THAT THE BARNET FRIENDS OF THE EARTH HAVE RELEASED A RE-CYCLING BOOKLET.
"HIGH BARNET SCHEME" THE HIGH BARNET GOOD NEIGHBOUR SCHEME HAS BEEN IN EXISTENCE FOR 18 MONTHS, AND ALREADY HAS OVER 100 VOLUNTEERS. THE SCHEME,BASED AT CHURCH HOUSE,WOOD STREET,IS CALLED UPON BY A LARGE SECTION OF THE COMMUNITY,AND THERE IS AN INCREASING NUMBER OF HEALTH SERVICE REFERRALS. BUT SOME AREAS ARE NOT FULLY COVERED AND HELP IS NEEDED WITH TRANSPORT AND GARDENING.
